subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: At Merion Golf Club’s East Course, the holes are marked by red, egg-shaped wicker baskets attached to steel sticks, not the traditional flags that wave with the wind.
snippet: At Merion Golf Club’s East Course, the holes are marked by red, egg-shaped wicker baskets attached to steel sticks, not the traditional flags that wave with the wind.
